EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Lean+Leaders_Backers_2016.Reminder - London - Day Before
EmailTemplate.subject: See You Tomorrow at the Leader’s Guide Workshop!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Leader’s Guide Workshop taking place tomorrow in London.
The Leader’s Guide To Adopting Lean Startup at Scale Friday, July 29th, 2016 Registration @ 9:30am Sessions Start @ 10:00am Workshop Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/lean-workshops/backers/london]]> Breakfast and lunch will be provided
Location Pivotal London <[[http://pivotal.io/locations/london]]> The Warehouse 211 Old Street, 2nd Floor London EC1V 9NR Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Pivotal+Software/@51.52618,-0.0907994,17z/data=!4m8!1m2!2m1!1sPivotal,+The+Warehouse,+211+Old+Street,+2nd+Floor,+London+EC1V+9NR!3m4!1s0x48761ca88321b72b:0xaa6a161c1fc6539d!8m2!3d51.526386!4d-0.089071]]>
Getting to Reception Scaffolding obscures sightlines to The Warehouse from the Old Street Roundabout, but if you persevere through the building site, you’ll find us!
Step-by-Step Directions
- Come out of Subway 4 from Old Street Tube Station - Walk up the ramp on your left - Immediately in front of you there is white boarding with "Ceviche" and "Maki" advertised, walk past this to the right into a mini courtyard - The revolving doors for our building are immediately on your left - Enter the building, walk down to your right past the coffee shop and you will find the elevators at the end; we are on the 2nd floor
Questions? Contact us at leadersguide@pivotal.io <[[mailto:leadersguide@pivotal.io]]>
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team
